text: Uchu Tatsumi (born January 23, 1972) is a Japanese mixed martial artist. He competed in the Bantamweight and Featherweight division. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Loss | align=center| 10-1-3 | Alexandre Franca Nogueira | Submission (guillotine choke) | Shooto:
